Name: Friends
Components: S, M (a small amount of makeup applied to the face as this spell is cast)

Name: Magic Stone
Components: V, S, M (one to three pebbles)

Name: Illusory Script
Components: S, M (an amethyst-based ink worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Protection from Evil or Good
Components: V, S, M (holy/unholy water, depending on target alignment, or powdered silver and iron, which the spell consumes)

Name: Digital Phantom
Components: V, S, F (an opal worth at least 50 gp)

Name: Clairvoyance
Components: V, S, M (a cosmic opal worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Hypnotic Pattern
Components: S, M (incense imbued with mystic quartz dust)

Name: Magic Circle
Components: V, S, M (a component depending on the effect, which the spell consumes)

Name: Remove Curse
Components: V, S, F, M (incense and one of the following: holy water, a vial of mercury worth at least 50 gp, diamond dust worth at least 50 gp, or cosmic opal dust worth at least 50 gp, all of which the spell consumes)

Name: Revivify
Components: V, S, M (diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Sending
Components: V, S, M (a lapis lazuli, a sapphire, a cosmic opal or a TSR device)

Name: Speak with the Dead
Components: V, S, F, M (burning incense imbued with onyx dust)

Name: Stinking Cloud
Components: V, S, M (a skull, a plaguestone, or a piece of material soaked in tainted water)

Name: Summon Lesser Demons
Components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood or garnet dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes, or a doomstone)

Name: Summon Lesser Void Demons
Components: V, S, M (a drop of ink or tanzanite dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes, or a whole tanzanite worth at least 150 gp)

Name: Banishment
Components: V, S, M (an item distasteful to the target)

Name: Calamitous Shadows
Components: V, S, M (a doomstone worth at least 150 gp)

Name: Summon Greater Demons
Components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood or garnet dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes, or a doomstone worth at least 500 gp)

Name: Greater Restoration
Components: V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Hallow
Components: V, S, M (herbs, oils, and incense worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Infernal Calling
Components: V, S, M (a garnet or a doomstone worth at least 999 gp)

Name: Legend Lore
Components: V, S, M (incense worth at least 500 gp and four gems, all of which the spell consumes)

Name: Passwall
Components: V, S, M (a pinch of sesame seeds)

Name: Scrying
Components: V, S, M (either a focus worth at least 10,000 gp, such as a crystal ball,  a silver mirror, or a font filled with holy water, or a cosmic opal worth at least 1,000 gp)

Name: Summon Horror
Components: V, S, M (a garnet or a doomstone worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Circle of Death
Components: V, S, M (an onyx worth at least 500 gp)

Name: Create Undead
Components: V, S, M (an onyx worth at least 150 gp for each corpse)

Name: Magic Jar
Components: V, S, M (an onyx, reliquary, or some other ornamental container worth at least 500 gp)

Name: Mental Prison
Components: S, M (an aventurine worth at least 1,000 gp)

Name: Soul Cage
Casting time: 1 reaction, which you take when a humanoid you can see within 60 feet of you dies
Components: V, S, M (a tiny black ore cage worth 100 gp)

Name: Summon Fey
Components: V, S, M (diaspore dust, which the spell consumes, or a whole diaspore gemstone)

Name: True Seeing
Components: V, S, M (an ointment for the eyes that contains mystic quartz dust worth at least 25 gp and is consumed by the spell)
